issue.title: Error "Unable to locate package ros-melodic-ros1-ign" during build of docker image

content.raw:
Sorry, “subt\_tc” is correct. I’m not able to run the docker container using “./run.bash subt\_tc”

output:

xauth: /tmp/.docker.xauth not writable, changes will be ignored  
xauth: \(argv\):1: unable to read any entries from file "\(stdin\)"  
chmod: Beim Setzen der Zugriffsrechte für '/tmp/.docker.xauth': Vorgang nicht zulässig  
Unable to find image 'subt\_tc:latest' locally  
docker: Error response from daemon: pull access denied for subt\_tc, repository does not exist or may require 'docker login'.  
See 'docker run --help'.
content.html:
Sorry, “subt_tc” is correct. I’m not able to run the docker container using “./run.bash subt_tc”

output:

xauth: /tmp/.docker.xauth not writable, changes will be ignored
xauth: (argv):1: unable to read any entries from file "(stdin)"
chmod: Beim Setzen der Zugriffsrechte für '/tmp/.docker.xauth': Vorgang nicht zulässig
Unable to find image 'subt_tc:latest' locally
docker: Error response from daemon: pull access denied for subt_tc, repository does not exist or may require 'docker login'.
See 'docker run --help'.
